sourcesContent:
export const questionObj = {"Qtext": "
 
Suppose that \(h + j = 2i \) and also it is given that 
\[
	\frac{1}{i } + \frac{1}{k } = \frac{2}{j }
\]
Now, prove that \(h \), \(i \), \(j \), and \(k \) are in proportion.
\newline

", "Steps": [{"id": "s1", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "It is given that 
\[
	\frac{1}{i } + \frac{1}{k } = \frac{2}{j }
\]
\[
	\frac{k + i }{\input[s1v1]{}k } = \frac{2}{j }
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow jk + ij = 2i\input[s1v2]{} 
\]"}, {"id": "s2", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow jk + ij = (\input[s3v1]{} + \input[s3v2]{} )k 
\]"}, {"id": "s3", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow jk + \input[s4v1]{}j = hk + jk 
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow i\input[s4v2]{} = hk 
\]"}, {"id": "s4", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{\input[s4v1]{} }{i } = \frac{\input[s4v2]{} }{k }
\]"}, {"id": "s5", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "$$\text{
This means that $h $, $i $, $j $, and $k $ are in proportion.

Hence proved.
\newline
}$$
"}]} 

 export const resp = [{"data": ["i", "k"], "text": "$$\text{Upon taking LCM's and cross-multiplying we get $jk + ij = 2ik $}$$"}, {"data": ["h", "j"], "text": "$$\text{Since, it is given that $h + j = 2i$, replacing $2i, we get $ jk + ij = (h + j )k $}$$"}, {"data": ["i", "j"], "text": "$$\text{Upon opening up the bracket and cancelling the common terms on both sides we get $ij = hk$}$$ "}, {"data": ["h", "j"], "text": "$$\text{Upon dividing both sides by $ik$, we get $\frac{h }{i } = \frac{j }{k }$}$$"}, {"data": [], "text": " "}]
